document_data.caption: A map showing the Angry Coxswain on Odd Street.
document_data.name: Angry Coxswain
document_data.mainbody: The '''Angry Coxswain''' was a [[tavern]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The tavern stood a single story tall.
document_data.Location: The Angry Coxswain was located in the central section Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] along the waterfront where [[Odd Street]] joined [[Dock Street (Waterdeep)|Dock Street]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The tavern was owned by a [[Mulan]] named [[Ramas Shehepset]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}. The house brewmaster at this time was a [[duergar]] named [[Orth Ironchisel]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: A [[magical]] ''[[Angry Coxswain Portal|portal]]'' existed within the tavern that Ramas and Orth used to ferry slaves to [[Mulhorand]]. The portal connected directly to a prison cell located in a market in [[Skuld]].
